DOC.brief_summary: Investigation new pill contain estrogen progestin order monitor inhibition ovulation young healthy female 3 treatment cycle
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Inhibition Ovulation Two Oral Estrogen/Progestogen Regimens Healthy , Young Females Over Period 3 Treatment Cycles
DOC.criteria: Healthy female volunteer , Age 18 35 year Contraindications use combine ( estrogen/progestogen ) contraceptive ( e.g . history venous/arterial thromboembolic disease ) Regular intake medication Clinically relevant finding ( ECG , blood pressure , physical , gynecological examination , laboratory examination ) Anovulatory pretreatment cycle
